content.rendered:
About Sweeten

Join Sweeten, a fast growing, award-winning tech company based in New York City and founded by trained architects. We’re a team of super ambitious and fun people who are fascinated by construction, design, and tech—and we’re building the go-to marketplace for major renovations.

excerpt.rendered: About Sweeten Join Sweeten, a fast growing, award-winning tech company based in New York City and founded by trained architects. We’re a team of super ambitious and fun people who are fascinated by construction, design, and tech—and we’re building the go-to marketplace for major renovations.
